transcript:
Customer: Namaste.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello, kaun?
Executive: Good afternoon, Salim ji baat kar rahe hain Patel Steel se?
Customer: Haan, kaun baat kar raha hai?
Executive: Salim ji, main Naveen baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bataiye kya hai kaam tha?
Executive: Salim ji actually aapke feedback ke regarding hi call kiya tha. Kal Harish ji aapka baat hua tha sir aapke service ke regarding aap service se khush nahi hain sir.
Unhone mujhe bataya.
Customer: Bhai mudde ki baat karo na, kyun ghuma rahe ho baat ko yaar. Aap logon ko kya aisi aadat padi hui hai kya?
Executive: Sir, main ghuma kaise raha hun? Main samjha nahi. Maine abhi aapko sirf yahi line boli hai ki sir aapka discussion hua hai Harish se.
Customer: Nahi, ye ye sab kuch pata hone ke bawajood bhi aap baar baar ek hi baat ghuma ke puch rahe ho ye hue ye hua. Ek yahan pe kya yaar sir aap kal subah baat hua. Maine usko maine usko main aapke saath ek cheez kehna chahta hun.
Executive: Sir, main main main main aapke saath ek cheez kehna chahta hun.
Customer: Maine sir aapko request dal diya hai, main bol diya hai, sab kuch main bol raha hun ki mujhe ab IndiaMART ki service ki zarurat nahi hai, mujhe koi bharosa nahi hai. Aap refund kara do baat khatam. Main chhe mahine se.
Executive: Wahi main jaanna chahta hun sir isiliye maine call kiya hai.
Customer: Aur aur pareshan kyun kar rahe hain mujhe aap bataiye.
Executive: Sir, main main usiliye maine call kiya refund discussion jo aapka hai na sir woh main jaanna chahta hun aapse. Aapko uske liye time dena padega. Aapne request ki hai.
Customer: Kya time dena hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Uske regarding main aapse baat karna chahta hun aur ye baat main video meeting pe aapse karna chahta hun. Aap video meeting pe aa sakte hain?
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Isse kya lena dena? Bhai main phone pe baat nahi hun kya main live nahi hun phone pe? Kya meri aatma baat kar rahi kar rahi hai? Kya baat kar rahe ho yaar?
Executive: Sir phone pe discussion aur video meeting mein antar hota hai sir.
Customer: Kyun? Kya kya antar hai?
Executive: Main ye jaanna chahta hun Salim ji aap IndiaMART 2017 se chala rahe hain.
Customer: Are usko chhodo na bhai main abhi refund ki baat kar raha hun uski uske depend uski baat.
Executive: Sir refund ki hi baat kar raha hun sir.
Customer: To aap refund aap maang rahe koi usko to aap jab maine maine aapko hain kya valid proof dena hai?
Executive: Accha mujhe valid proof to doge na sir?
Customer: Sir refund kis cheez ke liye maang rahe ho sir main samjhu to pehle. Aap IndiaMART use kar rahe ho aapko inquiries hum de rahe hain. Sold out ka jo issue hai sir woh to process hai IndiaMART ka aur woh 2017 se hai sir. Abhi naya to hai nahi.
Executive: Are usko bhai chhod do na main jo mujhe service nahi chahiye abhi mujhe aap aap mera.
Customer: Sir wahi main jaanna chahta hun aap service kyun nahi chalana chahte wahi to main jaanna chahta hun sir.
Executive: Mere paas koi option nahi hai mere paas ek hi option hai refund ka.
Customer: Sir sir ek cheez samjho sir aisa aapne jab paise lagaye the ye socha tha ki sir aap beech mein band kar loge service? Ki aapko band karana hai aapne paise lagaye ki IndiaMART se aapko business mile right?
Executive: Sir wahi main jaanna chahta hun.
Customer: Are bhai aur usi ke liye main baat karna chahta hun. Dimag ka nahi kyun chah rahe ho mujhe nahi service chahiye to phir kyun pareshan kar rahe ho bhai?
Executive: Sir wahi discussion ke liye main chahta hun aap do minute online aa jao isko conclude kar lete hain.
Customer: Discussion nahi karni hai mujhe kisi se bhi tumhare kisi boss se bhi nahi karni hai tumhare malik se bhi nahi karni hai. Mujhe IndiaMART ki service nahi chahiye.
Executive: Sir main usi ki bhi baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Sir main branch manager hi baat kar raha hun isiliye maine direct aapko call lagayi Salim ji ki aapse baat karke isko hum conclude kar paaye. Aapko 5-10 minute dena padega sir.
Executive: Tab tak aap 10 minute nahi 10 minute se to magajmari kar rahe ho mere saath ye nahi kar dunga woh nahi kar dunga mujhe nahi chahiye bhai refund kar do bas aapko khali batana hai.
Customer: Sir refund refund aise thodi hota hai sir ki aapne bola aur refund ho gaya sir aap discussion to karenge na sir. Main jaanu to dikkat kya aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kyun paise paise paise aise hi le liya hai. Ye thodi aapka aise hi kar do ho jayega.
Customer: Sir jabardasti is paise se kya matlab hai mera? Us time video meeting karaya tha us time.
Executive: Sir woh puri rule mein nahi hai paise aapke.
Customer: Aapke aapka discussion nahi hua tha kisi se bina discussion ke aapne koi payment to nahi ki hai na sir?
Executive: Matlab aapko paise rakhna hai abhi pura?
Customer: Aap video meeting pe aao ek baar samjho to sir ki dikkat kahan se aa rahi hai.
Executive: Dhokhadhadi karni hai mere saath.
Customer: Sir dhokhadhadi kaise ho gayi batana mujhe aap sir. Dhokhadhadi kaise ho gayi?
Customer: Payment nahi dene ka matlab kya hua refund dene ka matlab kya hua?
Executive: Sir video meeting video meeting na karne ka reason batao sir ek reason batao aap.
Customer: Galat galat tarike se chhe mahine time nikal diya main teen teen mahine se refund ke liye bol raha hun main ki mera refund kar do mujhe nahi chahiye service tumhari. Kya baat kar rahe ho?
Executive: Ek cheez batao Salim ji mujhe ek cheez batao video meeting na karne ka reason batao ki main nahi karna chahta is wajah se.
Customer: Kyun? Kyun main karun uska reason batao. Kyun karun main uska reason batao.
Executive: Refund ka discussion sir aapne aapne bola na mujhe refund chahiye to mujhe samajhne to do sir ki refund kis wajah se maang rahe ho aap.
Customer: Payment karte waqt kahan maine video meeting ki thi?
Executive: Sir video meeting pe discussion main ye dikhana chahta hun sir ki IndiaMART se aap bata rahe ho na sir ki inquiry aa rahi hai aap tak nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Mujhe nahi dekhna hai. Are bhai tumhara kuch nahi dekhna hai maine sab dekh liya hai. Ye last dekh hi raha hun chhe mahine se tabhi to main ye last decision pe aana hua hai mera ki refund kar do bas.
Executive: Salim ji dekhiye aapki aap refund chaah rahe ho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer does not want to continue service.

- Customer is being asked for valid proof.

Resolution:

- Executive wants to discuss the refund process.

- Executive asked customer to join a video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. 

- Executive asked customer to join video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, video meeting, service
